definitions.description: A contract of insurance between the customer and the Insurer. The Policy relates to a parent Policy. This provides support to different scenarios, e.g., handling Policy amendments (add only the new amendments to a child Policy record) or handling collective policies.

constantValues: A contract of insurance between the customer and the Insurer. The Policy relates to a parent Policy. This provides support to different scenarios, e.g., handling Policy amendments (add only the new amendments to a child Policy record) or handling collective policies.

members.name: policyId
members.description: Unique identifier for entity instances.

members.name: createdOn
members.description: Date and time when the record was created.

constantValues: Date and time when the record was created.

members.name: modifiedOn
members.description: Date and time when the record was modified.

constantValues: Date and time when the record was modified.

members.name: statecode
members.description: Status of the Insurance Policy

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder}

supportingAttribute.explanation: This attribute 'statecode_display' is added to the 'Policy' entity to provide the localized display text for the value of the listLookup attribute 'statecode'
supportingAttribute.name: statecode_display

members.name: statuscode
members.description: Reason for the status of the Insurance Policy

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupCorrelatedValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder, correlatedValue}

supportingAttribute.explanation: This attribute 'statuscode_display' is added to the 'Policy' entity to provide the localized display text for the value of the listLookup attribute 'statuscode'
supportingAttribute.name: statuscode_display

constantValues: Reason for the status of the Insurance Policy

members.name: importSequenceNumber
members.description: Sequence number of the import that created this record.

constantValues: Sequence number of the import that created this record.

members.name: overriddenCreatedOn
members.description: Date and time that the record was migrated.

constantValues: Date and time that the record was migrated.

members.name: timeZoneRuleVersionNumber
members.description: For internal use only.

members.name: UTCConversionTimeZoneCode
members.description: Time zone code that was in use when the record was created.

constantValues: Time zone code that was in use when the record was created.

members.name: name
members.description: Required name field.

members.name: amendmentnumber
members.description: Version of the amendment to existing Policy- all transactions in a Policy term.

constantValues: Version of the amendment to existing Policy- all transactions in a Policy term.

members.name: cancellationdate
members.description: The date on which the Insurance Policy was cancelled.

constantValues: The date on which the Insurance Policy was cancelled.

members.name: cancellationreason
members.description: The reason for canceling the Insurance Policy.

constantValues: The reason for canceling the Insurance Policy.

members.name: cancellationtype
members.description: Reason of cancellation.

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder}

supportingAttribute.explanation: This attribute 'cancellationtype_display' is added to the 'Policy' entity to provide the localized display text for the value of the listLookup attribute 'cancellationtype'
supportingAttribute.name: cancellationtype_display

members.name: effectivedate
members.description: The date on which the Policy is in effect.

constantValues: The date on which the Policy is in effect.

members.name: expirationdate
members.description: The date when the Insurance Policy expires.

constantValues: The date when the Insurance Policy expires.

members.name: insurer
members.description: The Insurer on the Policy.

members.name: lastpaymentdate
members.description: The date on which the last payment of the premium was made.

constantValues: The date on which the last payment of the premium was made.

members.name: lastrenewaldate
members.description: The date on which the Policy was last renewed.

constantValues: The date on which the Policy was last renewed.

members.name: paidpremium
members.description: The total amount of premium paid against the Policy for the billing period.

constantValues: The total amount of premium paid against the Policy for the billing period.

members.name: paidpremium_Base
members.description: Value of the paid premium in base currency.

constantValues: Value of the paid premium in base currency.

members.name: paidtodate
members.description: The date until which the Insurance Policy is active.

constantValues: The date until which the Insurance Policy is active.

members.name: parentpolicy
members.description: Reference to the effective Policy of parent group.

constantValues: Reference to the effective Policy of parent group.

members.name: paymentduedate
members.description: The date on which the next payment of the premium is due.

constantValues: The date on which the next payment of the premium is due.

members.name: policynumber
members.description: Unique Insurance Policy number in the source system.

constantValues: Unique Insurance Policy number in the source system.

members.name: policyproduct
members.description: The product sold in the Policy.

constantValues: The product sold in the Policy.

members.name: policystatus
members.description: The status of the Insurance Policy such as new, renewed, expired.

supportingAttribute.name: policystatus_display

supportingAttribute.name: policytype_display

members.name: premiumadjustment
members.description: Value of premium adjustment.

members.name: premiumadjustment_Base
members.description: Value of the premium adjustment in base currency.

constantValues: Value of the premium adjustment in base currency.

members.name: premiumfrequency
members.description: Frequency of premium payments against the Policy such as monthly, quarterly, semiannual, or annual.

members.name: premiumoverterm
members.description: Value of premium over term.

members.name: premiumoverterm_Base
members.description: Value of premium over term in base currency.

constantValues: Value of premium over term in base currency.

members.name: quotenumber
members.description: Number associated with initial quote for the Policy.

constantValues: Number associated with initial quote for the Policy.

members.name: quoterevisionnumber
members.description: Version number of the revised quote for the Policy.

constantValues: Version number of the revised quote for the Policy.

members.name: renewaldate
members.description: Upcoming/Next renewal date.

members.name: revisionnumber
members.description: Policy revision number.

members.name: saledate
members.description: The date when the Insurance Policy was sold (which may precede the effective date).

constantValues: The date when the Insurance Policy was sold (which may precede the effective date).

members.name: surrendervalue
members.description: The value in case of cancelling the Insurance Policy before it is due.

constantValues: The value in case of cancelling the Insurance Policy before it is due.

members.name: surrendervalue_Base
members.description: Value of the Surrender Value in base currency.

constantValues: Value of the Surrender Value in base currency.

members.name: totalpremium
members.description: The total amount of premium for the Insurance Policy over the term of the Policy.

constantValues: The total amount of premium for the Insurance Policy over the term of the Policy.

members.name: totalpremium_Base
members.description: Value of Total premium in base currency.

constantValues: Value of Total premium in base currency.

members.name: transactionpremium
members.description: The change in the premium which resulted from a change within the current billing period.

constantValues: The change in the premium which resulted from a change within the current billing period.

members.name: transactionpremium_Base
members.description: Value of the transaction premium in base currency.

constantValues: Value of the transaction premium in base currency.
